revised_title: Papers Read to the Society: Micro-crystalline Structure of Platinum, Comparative Study of Element Properties, Arterial and Venous Walls, and Echinus esculentus Development
tldr: This article presents four papers read to the Royal Society of London, discussing the micro-crystalline structure of platinum, a comparative study of element properties, the properties of arterial and venous walls, and the development of Echinus esculentus.
